title: Jay@inno
author: Jay@inno
content: Hey guys, we're looking to run a bounty campaign on bitcointalk, if there are any mods out that that have experience in managing these campaigns and have proof of work then please contact me!Thanks!

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: February 22, 2023, 04:37:38 AMLast edit: February 22, 2023, 01:48:12 PM by albon
comments.body: There are many trusted bounty managers in the forum who have a portfolio full of many projects that they have managed, and who have experience and skills in the success of the bounty campaigns that they will deal with such as @irfan_pak10, @Hhampuz, @julerz12, @yahoo62278, @Royse777. You can check out the following topic link to see their portfolios and ANN topics and the ways to contact them. [1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4412712.0BTW, why did you not mention any information about your project (such as the website or its accounts on social media, etc.), or your account on Telegram, or others, so that those who wish to work can contact you?!

comments.author: BountySujon
comments.body: I'm from the Sujon Baunty Management Community. I want to run a bounty campaign with your project. Let me know if you're interested. I've preached a lot of bounty campaigns before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Also ask me any questions if you want to do more about a bounty campaign.My Contract Telegram: https://t.me/BountySujon

comments.author: Tanbir9@
comments.created_time: February 23, 2023, 02:21:44 PMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 02:40:27 PM by Tanbir9@
comments.body: Also ask me any questions if you want to do more about a bounty campaign.My Contract Telegram: https://t.me/tanbirkhan
